name: DEAD WARFARE: Zombie Games 3D
description:
The world is filled with zombies, tens of billions of the dead are destroying the Earth and non-stop. Let’s join the battle and become a legend!

DEAD WARFARE is an extreme zombie survival game with lots of features:

BEST FPS WITH MANY KINDS OF CHARACTERS
- Shooters are categorized into different classes with unique skills and shooting guns.
- Each class can use one kind of weapon and is most effective against the zombie.
- Characters have levels and stars

PLENTY OF ZOMBIES 
- The zombies are dangerous with many kinds of behaviors and abilities.
- The Bosses look like giants and can snatch any creatures near them and call others zombie
- There are always new kinds of zombie, which appear in new survival locations.

POWERFUL WEAPONS
- Many types of gun can be viewed in 3D.
- Shooting guns can be customized and upgrade with various parts
- All kinds of shooting guns can be randomly found in the warfare world.
- Choosing the correct shooting guns can help you to take down a zombie faster.

BE THE LAST ONE STANDING IN PVP BATTLE 
- The shooter can defend against and fight with opponents around the world.
- Your mission is not only to kill all zombie, but also protect your own survival base and destroy other buildings to get food and fuel.
- There is a ranking system to compare all shooters.

MASSIVE BATTLES IN DIFFERENT LOCATIONS
- Shooting FPS players can explore many places to find supplies and survivors
- Many different target locations with new challenges and zombie
- Each survival place contains a secret waiting to be revealed for the shooter.

EPIC EFFECTS & 3D GRAPHICS
- Realistic lighting and texture present zombies, guns and FPS environments.
- Zombie shooting game with 3D characters have different looks and skills for more survival strategy.

Download now and have fun!
